transformations.name: MapDrifted
transformations.description: Creates an explicit mapping for each drifted column

typeProperties.script:
source(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true) ~> iotsteam
MapDrifted filter(toInteger(Year) >= 2018) ~> RecentYears
iotsteam derive(Year = toShort(byName('Year')),
		Industry_aggregation_NZSIOC = toString(byName('Industry_aggregation_NZSIOC')),
		Industry_code_NZSIOC = toString(byName('Industry_code_NZSIOC')),
		Industry_name_NZSIOC = toString(byName('Industry_name_NZSIOC')),
		Units = toString(byName('Units')),
		Variable_code = toString(byName('Variable_code')),
		Variable_name = toString(byName('Variable_name')),
		Variable_category = toString(byName('Variable_category')),
		Value = toString(byName('Value')),
		Industry_code_ANZSIC06 = toString(byName('Industry_code_ANZSIC06'))) ~> MapDrifted
RecentYears aggregate(groupBy(Year,
		Variable_name),
	Value = sum(toDouble(Value))) ~> Summary
Summary sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> SummaryFor2018
